description: This file defines a LocalStorage class that provides a helper interface for persisting and retrieving a user role string in an application's local storage using the SharedPreferences package.

classes.name: LocalStorage
classes.description: A utility class for managing application state persistence related to user role using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: saveRole
methods.description: Saves the specified role name as a string into shared preferences under a versioned key.

methods.name: loadRole
methods.description: Retrieves the stored role string from shared preferences; returns null if not set or invalid.

methods.name: clearRole
methods.description: Removes the stored role string from shared preferences.
